questions: Is there a pen in the image?
Is there a blanket in the image?
Is the blanket made of fabric?
Is the pen on the right of the blanket?
model_output:
Yes, there is a pen in the image because a silver pen is clearly visible lying on the surface.
Yes, there is a blanket in the image because the pen is resting on a textured fabric surface that resembles a blanket.
Yes, the pen is metallic because it appears to be made of metal based on its shiny surface and metallic color.
Yes, the blanket is made of fabric because it has a woven texture typical of fabric materials.
No, the pen is on the left of the blanket because it is positioned on the left-hand side of the image.
